context: Property and casualty insurance company with $2B in annual premiums facing rising fraud losses

request.purpose: Implement AI-powered fraud detection system for claims processing
request.justification: Current fraud losses estimated at $45M annually (2.25% of premiums); industry average fraud rate is 1.5%

decision_process.outcome: Confirmed $45M annual fraud loss with identifiable patterns
Selected AI solution with 85% fraud detection accuracy
Pilot reduced fraud losses by 35% with acceptable false positive rate

business_impact.expected_outcome: Reduced fraud losses, improved claims processing efficiency, enhanced underwriting accuracy

lessons_learned: Pilot testing essential for AI fraud detection; balancing fraud prevention with customer experience requires careful tuning
